:The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. Please do not modify it. Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. The result of the move request was: page moved.

The reason you couldn't move it, Difu Wu, is that there was more than one edit in the history at the target location. As soon as there is such a "non-trivial history", page moves become impossible without deleting the old history first. Blanking the page won't do it, and in fact adds a non-trivial edit to the history, thus making the move impossible if it wasn't already. In this case, there were already two edits in the history before you got there, so it didn't matter. -

:I tried, but couldn't move it. Someone else please try.

Ropar to Rupnagar is not a spelling change, so the previous request to move is not in order; the town of Rupnagar may claim ownership of the Institution, but at the official page at http://www.iitd.ac.in/iitrpr/ the Institution identifies itself as IIT Ropar (used to be IIT Punjab) and I cannot find a mention of IIT Rupnagar anywhere.

[[:Indian Institute of Technology Rupnagar]] → [[Indian Institute of Technology Ropar]] — This is the correct name for the Institution as in the official web page that is listed right here; heck, even the logo here shows this name only. —

The revision https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Indian_Institute_of_Technology_Ropar&oldid=578348068 asks why their edits are being reverted.

Here is the explanation: The revision adds two section:

# Campus Placements: which contains out-of-date and incorrect information.
# News Room: which contains a random selection of news stories mentioning IIT Ropar. These are very clearly promotional and serve no encyclopaedic purpose.

Because of these reasons, your edits were reverted.

:The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. Please do not modify it. Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. The result of the move request was: page moved.

The reason you couldn't move it, Difu Wu, is that there was more than one edit in the history at the target location. As soon as there is such a "non-trivial history", page moves become impossible without deleting the old history first. Blanking the page won't do it, and in fact adds a non-trivial edit to the history, thus making the move impossible if it wasn't already. In this case, there were already two edits in the history before you got there, so it didn't matter. -

Feel free to state your position on the renaming proposal by beginning a new line in this section with *Support or *Oppose, then sign your comment with ~~~~. Since [[Wikipedia:Polling is not a substitute for discussion|polling is not a substitute for discussion]], please explain your reasons, taking into account [[Wikipedia:Naming conventions|Wikipedia's naming conventions]]. * *Support *Support: Page should be moved to correct spelling errors. No vote against, so moving page.

:I tried, but couldn't move it. Someone else please try.

The revision https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Indian_Institute_of_Technology_Ropar&oldid=578348068 asks why their edits are being reverted.

Here is the explanation: The revision adds two section:

# Campus Placements: which contains out-of-date and incorrect information.
# News Room: which contains a random selection of news stories mentioning IIT Ropar. These are very clearly promotional and serve no encyclopaedic purpose.

Because of these reasons, your edits were reverted.

:The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. Please do not modify it. Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. The result of the move request was: page moved.

The reason you couldn't move it, Difu Wu, is that there was more than one edit in the history at the target location. As soon as there is such a "non-trivial history", page moves become impossible without deleting the old history first. Blanking the page won't do it, and in fact adds a non-trivial edit to the history, thus making the move impossible if it wasn't already. In this case, there were already two edits in the history before you got there, so it didn't matter. -

Feel free to state your position on the renaming proposal by beginning a new line in this section with *Support or *Oppose, then sign your comment with ~~~~. Since [[Wikipedia:Polling is not a substitute for discussion|polling is not a substitute for discussion]], please explain your reasons, taking into account [[Wikipedia:Naming conventions|Wikipedia's naming conventions]]. * *Support *Support: Page should be moved to correct spelling errors. No vote against, so moving page.

Any additional comments:
:I tried, but couldn't move it. Someone else please try.
